name: No War
description:
I wrote this verse on the second day of the attack of Russian troops on Ukraine.
Most of the proceeds from the sale will be used to support the Ukrainian army, which defends the country.

Translation:

Alive.
Is there anything more important than life?
Grass.
The wasteland will soon be overgrown with spring grass.
Above your head.
I want to feel the sky above my head.
